messages.message: Is there an out of the box way to reorder pages in an input file?  We may have to demo this for a client where an input file that we have to process may have the pages out of order.  Is there a way to determine that the file is out of order and correct the order?

afaik, we currently donâ€™t support any sort of out-of-the-box UI to reorder pages for a file. But we are planning on getting this shipped in 22.08 in Flow Review. So you could build a Flow where you first Process Files -> Apply Checkpoint and reorder pages at that first checkpoint.

CC: @Franklin Chian
